misc¶

This module contains functionality for miscellaneous tasks.

Reference¶

apercal.subs.misc.create_antnames()[source]¶

Creates a list of strings with the antenna names returns(list): A list of strings with the antenna names

apercal.subs.misc.create_feednames()[source]¶

Creates a list of strings for the feed names returns(list): A list of strings with the feed names
